verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Arise, my soul, arise, newline Shake off thy guilty fears; newline The bleeding sacrifice newline In my behalf appears; newline Before the throne my surety stands, newline My name is written on His hands, newline My name is written on His hands.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He ever lives above, for me to intercede; newline His all redeeming love newline His precious blood to plead; newline His blood atoned for all our race, newline And sprinkles now the throne of grace, newline And sprinkles now the throne of grace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Father hears Him pray, newline His dear Anointed One; newline He cannot turn away newline The presence of His Son: newline His Spirit answers to the blood, newline And tells me I am born of God, newline And tells me I am born of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My God is reconciled, newline His pardoning voice I hear; newline He owns me for His child, newline I can no longer fear; newline With confidence I now draw nigh, newline And Father, Abba Father cry, newline And Father, Abba Father cry!
